chunk:
Alder New York Brightening Face Mask

Brand: Alder New York

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water/ Eau, Kaolin, Hydroxypropyl starch phosphate, Silt, Zinc oxide, Glycerin, 3-Glyceryl ascorbate (vitamin C), Tocopherol acetate (vitamin E), Calendula officinalis (calendula) flower extract, Chamomille Recutita (matricaria) flower extract, Sodium hyaluron

act, Sodium hyaluronate, Benzylalcohol, Dehydroacetic acid, Gardenia jasminoides fruit extract

Directions: Apply this radiance-boosting mud mask to your clean face and neck after cleansing. Rinse off after 3-5 minutes with cool water to see instant results. Use 1-3 times a week as needed.

Warnings: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.
